body_html:
@chenqifeng22 you can use py_func to define gradient function using Python
ops, as described here --
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/40060047/tensorflow-how-can-i-process-in-numpy-op-outputs-in-py-func-gradient/40065673#40065673
